summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1517, for the improvement of the Twenty-seventh Avenue South main Trunk Sewer District, and to construct within said trunk sewer district a main trunk sewer, with certain short branches to intercept certain laterals heretofore constructed. The boundaries of the district constituting sand "Twenty-seventh Avenue South main trunk sewer District" included all the territory described therein, under Ordinance No. 16267 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
